meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andrew Winner Andrea West Katie Frank Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6861.

td.p: Andrew Winner, a learning and development consultant originally from Spokane, Washington
Andrea West, a college composition instructor from Columbia, South Carolina
Katie Frank, a graduate student in communications studies from Poway, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $38,600)

tr.td: FINISH THE TERRIBLE RHYME
THE 1950s
ALAN RICKMAN ROLES
HONG KONG
PHOOEY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Diplomacy in action", which really does sound great / Is on the website of the cabinet department that we call...')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Diplomacy in action", which really does sound great / Is on the website of the cabinet department that we call...

As a 9-megaton ICBM could devastate 900 square miles, it seems less than adequate that a 1950s Civil Defense film had a turtle teaching schoolchildren this 3-word defense maneuver against a nuclear attack')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

As a 9-megaton ICBM could devastate 900 square miles, it seems less than adequate that a 1950s Civil Defense film had a turtle teaching schoolchildren this 3-word defense maneuver against a nuclear attack

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Katie
Andrea
Andrew
NOOSE MEN
BENS & JERRYS
CAPITALS AT STATEHOOD
BEAUTIFUL QUOTATIONS
DIALECTS
THE SECRET LIFE OF B's
(Alex: Each correct response will contain a silent "B".)
